item.description:
Classic Movie - Annie Hall (USA, 1977) 93 min. Director Woody Allen

A nervous romance movie ;-)

Annie Hall (1977)
Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.
http://www.imdb.com/rg/em_share/title_web/title/tt0075686/

Romantic adventures of neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer and his equally neurotic girlfriend Annie Hall. The film traces the course of their relationship from their first meeting, and serves as an interesting historical document about love in the 1970s.

Movies at the Whitney are always FREE. Movie begins at 7pm. I will be in the lobby until 6:45-50 then head in to find seats.

Let me know if you are interested in meeting for coffee before at Wall Street Coffee

Â Happy New Year Everyone..
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture.. (except no horns :-) ) I will be in lobby probably a red coat
